about.title: The Cosmic Awakening
about.subtitle: Psychotherapist, Professional Closer & Business and Branding Expert
about.description: LEVEL UP is above all fertile ground made up of a multitude of precious clays. You are this fertile ground that Allah created, the foundation of every society with the power to select, carry life and educate it alongside true souls.
about.missionText: Offer men and women of value the opportunity to awaken, progress and come together to create a very high-value healthy society
about.womenVisionText: , you carry within you the sacred power of selection, creation and education. You are the secret garden that every true man aspires to protect.
about.menVisionText:
, your mission is to guide, protect and stabilize. You are the star in the night that every authentic woman wishes to have by her side.

Together, our common goal is to offer Allah sincere devotion and thank Him for His countless blessings.
about.padawanText: You are this blessed land that Allah created, the foundation of every flourishing society.

contact.title: Ready for Elevation?
contact.subtitle: The universe conspires for your success. There is only one step left to enter your new reality.
contact.guaranteeText: If you don't experience a notable energy elevation, we will fully refund your investment.

footer.copyright: ¬© 2024 LEVEL UP. All rights reserved in this dimension and beyond.

whoAmI.title: Who Am I?
whoAmI.subtitle: As my Padawans call me
whoAmI.journeyText: With several years of experience in Psychotherapy and personal and professional Development, I accompany men and women of value in their quest for excellence. My mission is to help you reveal your potential and achieve your most ambitious goals.
whoAmI.visionText: I firmly believe that every person has extraordinary potential. My approach combines Psychological and Muslim methods based on the Quran and my own value system, to create lasting and significant transformations in your personal and professional life.

formations.title: Exclusive Training
formations.subtitle: Develop your skills with our premium training designed for ambitious men and women
formations.comingSoonText: New exclusive training coming soon. Stay tuned!

services.title: Our Elevation Portals
services.subtitle: Each L represents a pillar, each pillar a nuance, each pillar a door that opens to a universe to explore
services.limitedGroup: Limited Group of 20 people with a symbolic price of 2500 DA for the first 10 pillars
services.connectionText: First mandatory session of the month to develop authentic connections and learn to surround yourself well
services.readingText: Second session: reading and analyzing a chapter from a book chosen together to enrich our perspectives
services.valueText: Third session: exploration and deep understanding of values and their implications in our lives
services.conferencesText: Fourth session: conference on a theme chosen together, worth 4000 DA each
services.whatsappText: Access to the exclusive LEVEL + group and direct questions to Nacer
services.googleMeetText: Every Friday at 7pm/8pm + replays from the year
services.pointsText: Earn points convertible into exclusive rewards

servicesProducts.title: Services & Products
servicesProducts.subtitle: Discover our personalized support services and exclusive products for your development
servicesProducts.comingSoonText: New exclusive services and products coming soon!
servicesProducts.bookExclusive: Exclusively available for those enrolled in the Perception program.
servicesProducts.contactMe: Contact me to learn more about
servicesProducts.customServiceText: Every journey is unique. Contact me to create a tailor-made solution that perfectly matches your needs and goals.
